messages.message:
<!subteam^SQ3KR3V17> for those of you looking to run ad hoc security scans when you are making changes to a service, we can now support that! https://jenkins.instabase.com/job/build-and-scan/build?delay=0sec

You will need to provide a few details:
`SERVICE_NAME` (for example `account-tservice`) and `SERVICE_PATH` (for example `core-services/account-tservices)

Interesting optional parameters:
`RELEASE_BRANCH` (defaults to `master`, but can be any branch on the fork, like `release-2020-05-11`
`RELEASE_FORK` (defaults to `instabase`, but could be any fork, for example `willluongo` will use my fork of the instabase repo)
`THRIFT_PATH` (defaults to thrift 0.13.0, this will rarely need to be changed)
